Text:
Hi,

Thanks for sharing this, but is it possible, by any which way, that you can upload this in a smaller size (700 MB to 1.4 GB) WITH subtitles?

Besides, can you upload the DVDRip/BRRip/BDRip of the following (or any of the following) movies WITH English subs (soft subs preferred, but hard subs will also be fine if no soft subs are available)?

1] Biutiful - http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1164999/

2] A-i-deul... (aka Children...) - http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1861982/

3] Insidious - http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1591095/


I'll be very grateful if you can do any of them, especially A-i-deul... (Sorry for repeating, but if it's possible for you to fulfill my request, please see to it that the Rip includes English subs.) Hope you can. Even if you can't, THANKS a lot.
thank you, best quailty as always
